name: DuaLITy (itch) (SankalpJ, ShubhSingh, DratBoi, Advaith Karnad)
description:
This game was built for the Epic MegaJam 2022. We are still highly motivated, so there might be future updates on this game.

When all light starts fading from the world, you have no option but to channel an old power, and tap into your shadow to steal back light. Phase between world using your limited Void Energy, collect photons to power the light, and find location of more void energy in the light world.

How to play:
A & D to move character left and right.
Spacebar to jump
F to phase between Light/Shadow Realm
Spacebar off a wall to wall jump

Mechanics:
Game starts off with some Photons and Void energy. Both are constantly depleting. Collect photons from the shadow realm to keep the game going, cross the threshold to COMPLETE THE LEVEL.
Collect void energy from the light realm. This energy is invisible in the light realm, but it's position can be seen in the shadow realm.
If you run out of void energy, you cannot phase to the Shadow Realm.
If you run out of photons, it is GAME OVER.;

Team: 

Sankalp Jajodia - https://sankalpj.itch.io

Advaith Karnad - https://axyleneomega.itch.io/

Nikhil Garg - https://dratboi.itch.io/

Shubh Singh - https://shubhsingh.itch.io/

Note :- Prior to this jam, none of us had any experience in Unreal Engine whatsoever. This game is the result of what we've learned and executed in 3 days.
